OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord performance status ( 0 vs 1 ) , TNM stage , participate center . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 cisplatin IV 3-6 hour day 2 . Treatment repeat 21 day later . Patients undergo high-dose accelerate conformal radiotherapy begin week 9 ( day 57 ) , 5 day week , 24 fraction , use concurrent boost technique 66 Gy . - Arm II : Patients receive low-dose cisplatin IV follow 1-2 hour later high-dose accelerate conformal radiotherapy .
